cooking_method: Marinate chicken in spices and yogurt. Grill chicken.Simmer tomatoes and spices in butter. Add cream and cooked chicken.Serve with rice or naan.
Sauté onion and tomato in oil.Add spinach and spices.Purée mixture.Cook paneer in sauce. Serve with rice or naan.
Sauté onion and spices in oil. Add chickpeas and tomatoes. Simmer until thickened.Garnish with coriander. Serve with rice or naan.
Marinate chicken in spices and yogurt. Grill chicken. Sauté onion and spices in oil. Add tomatoes and cream. Add cooked chicken. Serve with rice or naan.
Sauté onion and spices in oil. Add potatoes and cauliflower.Simmer until tender. Garnish with coriander. Serve with rice or naan.
Soak lentils and beans overnight. Boil lentils and beans with spices.Add tomatoes and cream. Simmer until thickened. Serve with rice or naan.
Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.  Grill or bake chicken.  Simmer tomato, cream, butter, and spices.  Add cooked chicken.  Serve with rice or naan.
Marinate paneer in yogurt, spices, lemon juice, and ginger garlic paste. Grill or bake paneer.  Serve with mint chutney.
Make dough with flour and water.  Cook potato and peas with spices.  Fill dough with potato mixture. Fry in oil.  Serve with tamarind chutney.
Cook chickpeas until tender.  Simmer tomato, onion, and spices.  Add cooked chickpeas.  Serve with rice or naan.
Cook spinach and blend to make puree.  Simmer onion, cream, spices, and paneer.  Add spinach puree.  Serve with rice or naan.
Soak lentils and beans. Cook lentils and beans until tender. Simmer cream, butter, and spices. Add cooked lentils and beans. Serve with rice or naan.
Blanch spinach and purée it. Frypaneer. Sauté spices and tomatoes. Add spinach purée and cream. Add fried paneer and serve hot with rice or naan.
Fry paneer. Sauté spices and tomatoes. Add green peas and simmer. Add cream and fried paneer. Serve hot with rice or naan.

Marinate chicken in spices and yogurt. Fry onion and set aside. Cook rice and layer it with chicken and fried onion. Bake or steam biryani until rice is fluffy and chicken is cooked. Serve hot with raita and papadum.
Blanch spinach and purée it. Fry paneer. Sauté spices and tomatoes. Add spinach purée and cream. Add fried paneer and serve hot with rice or naan.
Fry paneer. Sauté spices and tomatoes. Add green peas and simmer. Add cream and fried paneer. Serve hot with rice or naan.
Soak lentils and beans. Cook lentils and beans until tender. Simmer cream, butter, and spices. Add cooked lentils and beans. Serve with rice or naan.

Marinate chicken in spices and yogurt. Fry onion and set aside. Cook rice and layer it with chicken and fried onion. Bake or steam biryani until rice is fluffy and chicken is cooked. Serve hot with raita and papadum.
Make dough with flour and water.  Cook potato and peas with spices.  Fill dough with potato mixture. Fry in oil.  Serve with tamarind chutney.

Boil and mash potatoes and paneer. Add spices and form into balls. Fry the balls until they are golden brown. Sauté spices and tomatoes. Add cream and simmer. Add fried balls and serve hot with rice or naan.
Sauté onion and spices. Add ground beef and cook until browned. Add tomatoes and simmer. Add green peas and cook until they are soft. Serve hot with rice or naan.
Cook rice in milk until it is soft. Add sugar and cardamom powder and simmer. Garnish with nuts and serve hot or chilled.
Soak rice and lentils separately overnight. Grind rice and lentils separately to make batter. Mix the batter and ferment for a few hours. Spread the batter on a hot griddle and cook until crispy.
